content.text:
<ide_selection>The user selected the lines 31 to 31 from c:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Gemini 3 hack\rallycoach\public\images\README.md:
hero-jumper: 800x1200+, transparent PNG

This may or may not be related to the current task.</ide_selection>

Change 1 â€” Move the jumper image to the left:
Find:
absolute bottom-0 right-0 z-20 h-[90%] w-full flex justify-end pointer-events-none
Replace with:
absolute bottom-0 left-0 z-20 h-[90%] w-full flex justify-start pointer-events-none
Change 2 â€” Make the text appear above (on top of) the jumper image:
Find:
relative z-10 text-center transform -translate-y-10 px-6
Replace with:
relative z-30 text-center transform -translate-y-10 px-6
That's it â€” two small class changes. The first moves the jumper from right to left, and the second raises the text's z-index above the jumper (z-30 > z-20) so the words render on top of the jumper image, while the jumper (z-20) stays above the team background (z-0).

content.text:
Both changes applied:

1. **Jumper image** moved from `right-0 justify-end` to `left-0 justify-start` (line 196)
2. **Text layer** raised from `z-10` to `z-30`, so it renders above the jumper (`z-20`) (line 172)
